Text: Why can't I move the sliders?

@coolblue123

Can you explain the problem better so i will help you?

Everything else works fine. The music plays, I can turn on 3D surround and use presets.

However I am unable to move the sliders to my desired values. Like for example I can't move #D surround to 10 from the default of 2. Clicking the slider and dragging doesn't work.

I have no idea if this is an issue on my computer or on the software itself...

@coolblue123 

I just test it and in it works fine.You are sure that left from the values you have the power button in on?

Take a look here i took a screenshots from my computer from the program:

http://img513.imageshack.us/img513/3919/65246152.jpg

In red i have the power buttons

@coolblue123

You must first activate DFX to can turn on 3D Sorround
I followed info and everything works perfectly . Sliders move. You should not lie. Thank you !
